name: Boop Knight
description:
In this game, you are a knight, with a special attack, which allows you to save your location and go back to your saved location. You have to beat enemies which drop "Cores" and per Core, you get 10 points. Share your score in the comments below :)

Controls

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Left click to shoot

Right Click to save your location

Return (the "Enter" key next under "Backspace")  to teleport back to saved location.

Credits Music

 In game music - HeatleyBros

 Main Menu Music - Kevin McLeod

Art

Game Background - edermunizz

Enemy and Player art - o_lobster

Rest of the things are done by Necrozplayz and Unknown Ultima

Game by Necrozplayz and Unknown Ultima.
